data.eml:eml: Genus Cyptophania Banks (Psocodea: ‘ Psocoptera’: Lepidopsocidae): unique features, augmented description of the generotype, and descriptions of three new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mockford, Edward L., Wynne, J. Judson (2013): Genus Cyptophania Banks (Psocodea: ‘ Psocoptera’: Lepidopsocidae): unique features, augmented description of the generotype, and descriptions of three new species. Zootaxa 3702 (5): 437-449, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3702.5.3
